Package org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JenaModelFactory
    Simple interface responsible for creating new instances of a Jena Model.
    PackageStateSerializer
    Responsible for (de)serializing specified fields of PackageState.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPackageToolConverter
    Abstract XStream converter for Package Tool GUI serialization.
    AnnotationDrivenXStreamMarshallerFactory  
    ApplicationVersionConverter  
    DefaultModelFactory
    Creates instances of the default Jena Model with support for prefix maps.
    DomainProfileUriListConverter  
    JenaModelSerializer
    Spring (Un)marshaller for Jena Model instances.
    PackageMetadataConverter
    Converts the package-level metadata from a Map&lt;String,String> to a serialized form and back.
    PackageNameConverter
    Responsible for serializing the name of a package, a simple string.
    SerializationAnnotationUtil  
    StreamMarshaller
    Associates a marshaller and an unmarshaller with the identified stream.
    UserPropertyConverter
    Converts the user specified properties Map&lt;URI,Property> to a serialized form and back.
    XStreamMarshallerFactory
    Exposes configuration options that are not made available by the Spring XStreamMarshaller class.
